00034 #ifndef _SINGLETON_H__
00035 #define _SINGLETON_H__
00036 
00037 // Added by Steve Streeting for Ogre
00038 #include "OgrePrerequisites.h"
00039 
00040 #if OGRE_COMPILER == COMPILER_MSVC
00041 // Turn off warnings generated by this singleton implementation
00042 #   pragma warning (disable : 4311)
00043 #   pragma warning (disable : 4312)
00044 #endif
00045 
00046 namespace Ogre {
00047 // End SJS additions
00050     template <typename T> class Singleton
00051     {
00052     protected:
00053 
00054         static T* ms_Singleton;
00055 
00056     public:
00057         Singleton( void )
00058         {
00059             assert( !ms_Singleton );
00060             int offset = (int)(T*)1 - (int)(Singleton <T>*)(T*)1;
00061             ms_Singleton = (T*)((int)this + offset);
00062         }
00063         ~Singleton( void )
00064             {  assert( ms_Singleton );  ms_Singleton = 0;  }
00065         static T& getSingleton( void )
00066             {  assert( ms_Singleton );  return ( *ms_Singleton );  }
00067         static T* getSingletonPtr( void )
00068             {  return ( ms_Singleton );  }
00069     };
00070 }
00071 #endif
